title: Why do I keep getting random Ads popping up when I'm using my device?
content:
I am randomly getting ads popping up when I am using apps like instagram, WhatsApp, messages and Twitter. I get a button on the screen saying "loading ad" and then a stupid advert comes up!!!
I want these ads to stop. I pay a significant amount of money for this phone per month, and I do not want ads popping up when I'm messaging on WhatsApp, messages or writing emails. I have not opted for these.
If there is anyone out there who knows how to stop this, please help! I will swap my phone for something else otherwise
